name: SlipKnight
description:
Slide your way around the arena and defeat your foes! SlipKnight is an arcade arena-style hack n' slash action game. Be the last man standing, and get as many kills as you can! Seek out the opportune moment to inflict a fatal blow on your opponent and come out on top.

Nothing needed but the mouse to play.

Have Fun!

Music Credits:

[No CopyRight Music] Surreal State - (Royalty Free Mystical Music)

Fanfare for Space - Kevin Macleod (No CopyRight Music)
